emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 stk løg' is best matched with 'løg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '3 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' as it represents the raw, unprocessed form of garlic, which is the most appropriate match given no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.
The ingredient '400 g risotto ris' is a type of rice. 'ris, parboiled' is the most suitable match as it is a general category of rice and the closest available option in the database.
The ingredient '2 dl hvidvin' is directly matched with 'hvidvin' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.

The ingredient '400 g flåede tomater' is best matched with 'tomat, flået, konserves' because 'flåede tomater' implies a processed form of tomato, and 'konserves' (canned) aligns with this processing level.
The ingredient '25 g tomatpuré' is directly matched with 'tomatpure, koncentreret' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.

The ingredient '9 dl grøntsagsbouillon' is a type of bouillon. While there isn't an exact match for 'grøntsagsbouillon', 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' is the most appropriate broader category as it represents a ready-to-eat bouillon, which is similar in processing to a vegetable bouillon.

The ingredient '25 g soltørrede tomater i olie' is best matched with 'soltørrede tomater' because it captures the primary ingredient and its processing (sun-dried). The 'i olie' (in oil) is a preparation method that does not significantly change the core ingredient's emissions compared to the sun-drying process itself.
The ingredient '125 g parmesan' is directly matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.

The ingredient '0.5 øko citron' is directly matched with 'citron' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product. The 'øko' (organic) descriptor does not change the fundamental nature of the ingredient for emission matching purposes.
The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is directly matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.

The ingredient '1 stk burrata' is a type of fresh Italian cheese, similar to mozzarella. Therefore, 'mozzarella ost, 30+' is the most appropriate broader category match as it represents a similar cheese product with comparable emissions.
The ingredient '25 g pesto' is directly matched with 'pesto' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.
The ingredient '25 g parmesan' is directly matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is an exact match in the database and represents the same product.

The ingredient '0.5 håndfuld basilikum' is best matched with 'basilikum, frisk' because it is the most direct and least processed form of basil available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.
